Package io.github.ai4ci.functions

Interface SimpleDistribution

All Superinterfaces:
Distribution, Serializable
All Known Subinterfaces:
SimpleDistribution.BetaDistribution, SimpleDistribution.BinomialDistribution, SimpleDistribution.GammaDistribution, SimpleDistribution.LogitNormalDistribution, SimpleDistribution.LogNormalDistribution, SimpleDistribution.NegBinomialDistribution, SimpleDistribution.NormalDistribution, SimpleDistribution.PointDistribution, SimpleDistribution.PoissonDistribution, SimpleDistribution.UniformDistribution, SimpleDistribution.UnimodalBetaDistribution
public interface SimpleDistribution extends Distribution, Serializable
Specify distributions and parameters in a way that makes configuring them in a JSON file is relatively straightforward. All distributions defined by a central and dispersion parameter which in most cases will be Mean and SD.

    • unimodalBeta

      static SimpleDistribution.UnimodalBetaDistribution unimodalBeta(Double mean, Double dispersion)
      Factory methods for unimodal beta distribution
      Parameters:
      mean - the mean of the distribution
      dispersion - the dispersion parameter of the distribution, which controls how tightly the distribution is concentrated around the mean. It is a number between 0 and 1 where 1 is the most dispersed that can be achieved for a given mean, extreme means (close to 0 or 1) will have lower maximum standard deviation.
      Returns:
      a UnimodalBetaDistribution instance with the specified mean and dispersion
